entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 7:48 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Wet flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wet flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm except 5 cm over western sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:48 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
